ygData.subject: RE: Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to have good faction in several places to complete this quest. That s why this is almost considered an enchanter-only quest. At least 2 of the
ygData.messageBody:
You have to have good faction in several places to complete this quest.
That's why this is almost considered an enchanter-only quest. At least 2 of
the components, and the final ending require a certain amount of faction
with the NPC involved. You willl still get the experience, faction, and cash
reward (if any) with insufficient faction, but you will not get the
resulting item. This bit me when I went to get Erud's Tonic. I didn't
realize that my Illusion:Erudite had worn off, therefore I didn't get the
tonic when I gave Sinnkin the Innoruk's Kiss of Death.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jimf [SMTP:jimf@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 8:20 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Stein
>
> So,
>
> I see all the talk about Stein quest and decied to try it.
> I do everying in the quest, at the end I talk with the Ogre give him the
> book....and I get NOTHING. A very little bit of exp....
>
> What could I have done wrong?
>
> Is this game still in beta?
>
> Zahlhedren Dementia
> Karana
>
